frontmatter.title: Spark on Kubernetes - better handling for node shutdown
frontmatter.description: Spark 3.1 on the Kubernetes project is now officially declared as production-ready and Generally Available. Spot instances in Kubernetes can cut your bill by up to 70-80%¬†if you are willing to trade in reliability. The new feature -¬†SPIP: Add better handling for node shutdown¬†(SPARK-20624) was implemented to deal with the problem of losing an executor when working with spot nodes - the need to recompute the shuffle or cached data.
